Bogota : On Sunday , a massive fire engulfed a bus carrying 32 children in Colombia .

A0: a bus carrying 32 children in Colombia
RelatedSentence: As per officials said that the bus was picking up children from an event at a church in Fundacion , Colombia , when the blaze began , as per officials said .
Authorities are investigating what caused the fire , officials said .
Authorities are investigating what caused the fire , officials said .
As per sources , one witness told that the driver went to get a drink and left children to put gasoline into the vehicle 's tank .
